metadata.title: CVE-2018-13112 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: get_l2len in common/get.c in Tcpreplay 4.3.0 beta1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via crafted packets, as demonstrated by tcpprep.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.3-2').
